title: Recca
description: Search, save, track, and recommend your favorite media in this full-stack MERN app.

title: Self-Improvement Kingdom
description: Build your army and battle your way to self-improvement in this full-stack, gamified task manager! Self-Improvement Kingdom is supported by Sequelize ORM, Passport, Cron, Node, Handlebars, and jQuery.

title: Journey Through The Solar System
description: Take an interactive and educational journey through the solar system, complete with API calls and Chart.js data visualization!

title: React Google Books Search
description: Search, save, and delete Google Books in this full-stack MERN application!

title: Simpsons Clicky
description: Test your memory in this Simpsons-themed clicky game, powered by React!

title: Eat Da Burger
description: Create and devour your favorite burgers in this fun, full-stack application that utilizes a Sequelize ORM!

title: Bamazon
description: Bamazon is a MySQL and Node.js application that functions as an online marketplace. Play the role of customer, manager, or supervisor!

title: Train Scheduler
description: Build your own real time train scheduler backed by Firebase and Moment.js!

title: Caddyshack Word Guess
description: Guess the classic characters from Caddyshack in a game of JavaScript Word Guess!

title: Boxing Classic
description: Classic boxers from different eras match up against each other to find out who is the real world champion in this boxing RPG!

title: Crystals Collector
description: Try and guess the target number with randomly generated crystal values in this JavaScript and jQuery game!
